resources.string: Classic Italian pasta dish with creamy sauce made from eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
Tender chicken pieces marinated in yogurt and spices, then cooked in a creamy tomato sauce, popular in Indian cuisine.
Russian dish featuring tender strips of beef cooked with onions, mushrooms, and sour cream, served over noodles or rice
Quick and healthy dish made by stir-frying a mix of colorful vegetables with soy sauce and other seasonings.
Simple Italian salad made with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, olive oil, and balsamic vinegar.
Thai street food favorite made with stir-fried rice noodles, tofu or shrimp, bean sprouts, peanuts, and a tangy sauce.
Hearty and spicy stew made with ground beef, beans, tomatoes, and chili peppers, perfect for a cozy night in.
Creamy Italian rice dish cooked with Arborio rice, mushrooms, onions, white wine, and Parmesan cheese.
Homemade sushi rolls filled with ingredients like fresh fish, avocado, cucumber, and crab meat, wrapped in nori seaweed and sushi rice.
Healthy and delicious salmon fillets marinated in a mix of lemon juice, garlic, and herbs, then grilled to perfection.
Flavorful Indian curry made with chicken pieces simmered in a rich sauce of tomatoes, onions, garlic, ginger, and spices.
Classic Mexican dip made with ripe avocados, tomatoes, onions, lime juice, cilantro, and jalapeños, served with tortilla chips.
Tasty Mexican street food made with seasoned ground beef, served in corn tortillas and topped with lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.
Quick and easy pasta dish featuring shrimp cooked in a lemon garlic butter sauce, served over linguine or spaghetti.
Crispy breaded chicken breasts topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese, served with pasta.
Spicy and sour Thai soup made with shrimp or chicken, mushrooms, lemongrass, lime leaves, and chili peppers.
Layers of lasagna noodles, marinara sauce, sautéed vegetables, ricotta cheese, and mozzarella cheese, baked to perfection.
Korean barbecue dish made with thinly sliced beef marinated in a sweet and savory sauce, then grilled or stir-fried.
Classic French Provencal stewed vegetable dish made with eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, onions, tomatoes, and herbs.
Simple yet flavorful pasta dish made with spaghetti or penne tossed in a sauce made from fresh basil, garlic, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, and olive oil.
Tender chicken thighs marinated in a mixture of honey, soy sauce, garlic, and ginger, then baked or grilled until caramelized.
Middle Eastern dish of poached eggs in a spicy tomato and pepper sauce, typically served with crusty bread for dipping.
Vietnamese noodle soup made with beef broth, rice noodles, thinly sliced beef, and an assortment of fresh herbs and condiments.
Middle Eastern street food made from ground chickpeas or fava beans, seasoned with herbs and spices, formed into balls, and deep-fried.
Elegant British dish featuring tender beef fillet coated with pâté and mushroom duxelles, wrapped in puff pastry and baked until golden brown.
Comforting soup made with roasted pumpkin, onions, garlic, broth, and cream, seasoned with herbs and spices.
Middle Eastern street food made with marinated chicken, roasted on a spit, and served with pita bread, tahini sauce, and pickled vegetables.
Layers of breaded and fried eggplant slices topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese, baked until bubbly.
Refreshing Latin American dish made with raw fish or seafood marinated in citrus juices, typically served with onions, cilantro, and chili peppers.
Classic comfort food made with chicken, vegetables, noodles, and broth, perfect for warming up on a chilly day.
